roleset.name: to make a copy or record on tape
roleset.note: TRANSCRIBE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls transcribe-25.4. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from transcribe.01-v)
TRANSCRIPTION-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to transcribe.01. Transcribe.01 is a member of VN class transcribe-25.4. Framed by Katie. (from transcription.01-n)

example.name: transcribe-v: transitive
example.text: What if I tune in my short-wave radio , transcribe an editorial or program , and print it in my newspaper ?

example.name: transcribe-v: with & link and end state
example.text: The Tale of Peter Rabbit transcribed *none*-? into Egyptian Hieroglyphic script: Amazon.co.uk:
example.arg: *none*-? -> ' & ' link to [The Tale of Peter Rabbit]

example.name: transcription-n: args 0 and 1. 'Dictated' is a VBN
example.text: Please refer to his dictated transcription of the operative notes.
